comment: Amazon Prime Day ? Item shipped , tracking available , not here , Amazon says it wasn't shipped and then was damaged when shipped . Wants me to buy another one with " free shipping . " Isn't that what Prime is ? ! Walmart , here I come !
amr:
# ::snt Amazon Prime Day ? Item shipped , tracking available , not here , Amazon says it wasn't shipped and then was damaged when shipped . Wants me to buy another one with " free shipping . " Isn't that what Prime is ? ! Walmart , here I come !
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (e / event
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Amazon"
                  :op2 "Prime"
                  :op3 "Day")
            :polarity (a / amr-unknown))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (s / ship-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (ii / item))
            :op2 (a3 / available-02
                  :ARG2 (t / track-01))
            :op3 (s2 / say-01
                  :ARG0 (c / company
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Amazon"))
                  :ARG1 (a4 / and
                        :op1 (s3 / ship-01
                              :ARG1 ii)
                        :op2 (d / damage-01
                              :ARG1 ii
                              :time (t2 / then)
                              :time (s4 / ship-01
                                    :ARG1 ii))))
            :snt3 (w / want-01
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                  :ARG1 (b / buy-01
                        :ARG0 ii2
                        :ARG1 (o / one
                              :mod (a5 / another))
                        :ARG3 (s5 / ship-01
                              :ARG1-of (f / free-03))))
            :snt4 (a6 / and
                  :op1 c
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Walmart")
                  :domain (t3 / that)
                  :polarity (a7 / amr-unknown))
            :op2 (c2 / come-01
                  :ARG1 ii2
                  :ARG4 (h / here))))

comment: Hello ! We re so very sorry for the disappointment . When you look at your order history here : <URL> , can you tell us which carrier was assigned to deliver this package ? ( AMZL , UPS , etc . ) . Let us know , we re here to help . ^ TY
